name: Circle Defence (Flowwave)
description:
Defend your Core by building defenses and spinning the circles around so your towers are in the right spot at the right time,

Controls:
- Click and hold on the 'rows' to drag them around
- Drag on drop towers from the shop
- Click existing towers multiple times to destroy them
- Click the core (center thingy) to move on to the next wave when in the shop

Note: For the Android version, larger screens are required to play comfortably
